dict.string: $(DEVELOPMENT_LANGUAGE)
Raipur Homes
$(EXECUTABLE_NAME)
$(PRODUCT_BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER)
fmraipuromes
APPL
$(FLUTTER_BUILD_NAME)
$(FLUTTER_BUILD_NUMBER)
Bluetooth access is required to connect to smart devices in homes listed on our platform, such as smart locks or security systems.
The camera is used to capture property images and profile pictures to enhance your property listings and user profile.
Location access is required to provide real-time updates on nearby properties, open houses, and market trends based on your current location, even when the app is in the background.
The app requires temporary access to your precise location to find properties near you and navigate to selected properties or open houses.
Location access is needed to show nearby properties and amenities while the app is in use, providing a better property search experience.
The microphone is needed for voice search functionality, allowing users to search for properties using voice commands.
Access to the photo library is needed to save images of properties and profile pictures to your device for offline viewing or editing.
Access to your photo library is required to upload images of properties and your profile picture to enhance your listings and profile.
Speech recognition is used to provide voice search capabilities, enabling a hands-free property search experience.
Notifications are required to alert you about new properties, market updates, and reminders for open houses based on your preferences.
LaunchScreen
Main
